Global purge_packet
Implement support for wildcards in to the packet_purge() function -mjs.
Parameters:
bufaddr Pointer to the buffer where the packet(s) is/are to be purged from.
packet_header A 25 octets long char array consisting of valid Tag-Value pairs, with remainig space filled with 0xff's.
Returns:
Number of packets purged, 0 (zero) if no packets were purged (no match), -1 if buffer was already empty or -2 if an unspecified error occured.
